item.title: Surfaces vs. Meshes
item.description:
So… in this post, I will try to introduce some very useful concepts that are widely used in Architectural Geometry, but that are borrowed from other disciplines like Aeronautical Engineering and, lately, Computer Graphics.

Most of these techniques are extremely useful for architectural purposes, specially in recent years, when the use of 3D Modeling CAD programs has become widespread in Architecture practices.

item.title: Hello!
item.description:
Welcome!

So… again, welcome to my new website. My name is Alan Rynne, I am an Architectural Engineer & Computational Specialist with a BIG crush on efficiency, not only on the design phase (structural behaviour, constructability) but also concerned on how to improve our workflows in the AEC industry.

In this blog I will be writing about many topics that I LOVE, mainly centered in:

  • Architectural Design
  • Programming
  • Architectural Geometry
  • Technological Improvements in Architecture
